description: Aspose.3D is a class library for working with 3D files. It allows developers to create new 3D scene and work with FBX,STL files. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements in the 3D scene, from line,mesh,nurbs curve, to more complex elements animation, and then export to FBX ASCII, FBX binary, STL ASCII and STL binary formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
New Features
(THREEDNET-2) -  Design Object Model for 3d model 
(THREEDNET-3) -  FBX 7400 ASCII importer and exporter
(THREEDNET-4) -  STL ASCII importer and exporter
(THREEDNET-5) -  STL binary importer and exporter 
(THREEDNET-7) -  FBX 7400 binary importer and exporter 
(THREEDNET-105) -  Add support for FBX 7500, ASCII importer and exporter,  binary importer and exporter
summary: Aspose.3D is a class library for working with 3D files.
title: Aspose.3D for .NET
